translations: 1. 围攻，围困：用武力包围并试图占领（城市、建筑等）。
· The enemy army besieges the city.
2. 纠缠，烦扰：不断地骚扰或困扰。

sentences.sentence: When famine or plague comes to the land, or blight or mildew, locusts or grasshoppers, or when an enemy besieges them in any of their cities, whatever disaster or disease may come
sentences.translation: 国中若有饥荒，瘟疫，旱风，霉烂，蝗虫，蚂蚱，或有仇敌犯境围困城邑，无论遭遇什么灾祸疾病
